name: Jigsaw Puzzler
description:
This game is made for LÖVE Jam 2023. The theme was "Connection".

How to play: Scramble the puzzle pieces into the correct positions.

This game may occurs some errors but in overall, it has been wrapped up and run smoothly.  (may have some updates if needed).

Any feedbacks about the game, please drop a comment. I would be more than happy to read them!
